dialogue: user: hello what are doing today?[NEWLINE]agent: i am good, i just got off work and tired, i have two jobs.[NEWLINE]user: i just got done watching a horror movie[NEWLINE]agent: i rather read, i have read about 20 books this year.[NEWLINE]user: wow! i do love a good horror movie. loving this cooler weather[NEWLINE]agent: but a good movie is always good.[NEWLINE]user: yes! my son is in junior high and i just started letting him watch them too[NEWLINE]agent: i work in the movies as well.[NEWLINE]user: neat!! i used to work in the human services field[NEWLINE]agent: yes it is neat, i stunt double, it is so much fun and hard work.[NEWLINE]user: yes i bet you can get hurt. my wife works and i stay at home[NEWLINE]agent: nice, i only have one parent so now i help out my mom.[NEWLINE]user: i bet she appreciates that very much.[NEWLINE]agent: she raised me right, i am just like her.[NEWLINE]user: my dad was always busy working at home depot[NEWLINE]agent: now that i am older home depot is my toy r us.

user: hi! how are you doing tonight?[NEWLINE]agent: i am doing great. just relaxing with my two dogs.[NEWLINE]user: great. in my spare time i do volunteer work.[NEWLINE]agent: that is neat. what kind of volunteer work do you do?[NEWLINE]user: i work in a homeless shelter in my town.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: good for you. do you like vintage cars? i have two older mustangs.[NEWLINE]user: cool. not really into cars. my day job is wrestling.[NEWLINE]agent: cars are my thing. vintage cars. i love working on them. wrestling? do you enjoy it?[NEWLINE]user: yes, i love the crowds, getting to know people.[NEWLINE]agent: i did not think about the crowd aspect of wrestling. i do not like crowds.[NEWLINE]user: understood. when i need to be alone, i work out a few times each week.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: i agree. working out is a great way to burn off steam. do you like country music?[NEWLINE]user: a little bit. i can get into taylor swift.[NEWLINE]agent: lol. she is more pop now. her old stuff was country. i like classic country.

user: hello, how are you doing?[NEWLINE]agent: i love spending time with my family[NEWLINE]user: that is great, me too! i am married and my husband and i have 2 children.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: so then have you ever been to disneyland?[NEWLINE]user: no, we recently purchased a new house, so we cannot afford it. have you?[NEWLINE]agent: yes i love mickey mouse such a cute little rat[NEWLINE]user: i enjoy going to concerts, i see the rolling stones every year.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: man your lucky i am a baby delivery nurse and the pay sucks[NEWLINE]user: maybe you should consider going back to school. i did. i major in economics.[NEWLINE]agent: i have to walk 3 miles to work to save money everyday what do you do?[NEWLINE]user: i mostly eat a fresh and raw diet, so i save on groceries.[NEWLINE]agent: your economic skills are amazing[NEWLINE]user: thank you very much! i am sure you are a great nurse.[NEWLINE]agent: i am a ok nurse i have dripped some babies though but i am getting better

user: hi how are you doing? i am okay how about you?[NEWLINE]agent: i am doing good. just sipping tea. what do you do for work?[NEWLINE]user: i used to do home health aide but now i am disabled.[NEWLINE]agent: i am sorry to hear that. what happened[NEWLINE]user: i graduated and got my license worked a while and became i will.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: so what do you do now for fun? i like to read.[NEWLINE]user: i have dogs and i walk them. and a cat.[NEWLINE]agent: what kind of dogs do you have?[NEWLINE]user: i enjoy reading read about michael jackson and psychology today.[NEWLINE]agent: i love reading. i have a big library at my house.[NEWLINE]user: that is very nice i love to read to and read about journals.[NEWLINE]agent: i have a tough time hearing so reading is my happy place.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: cool that is okay. my mom was very tough on me.[NEWLINE]agent: i work as a hearing impaired museum tour guide.

user: hi i dye my hair 4 times a year[NEWLINE]agent: do you live in the sky? i do. in the clouds.[NEWLINE]user: no i do not, i have a dream, it is to work from home[NEWLINE]agent: i make time stop. i have a superpower. i am a super hero.[NEWLINE]user: that is really cool that you can do that[NEWLINE]agent: i love living in the clouds the best. do you have powers?[NEWLINE]user: no i do not, i faint when i see blood[NEWLINE]agent: i do not like blood. i vomit.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: i went to school to be a vet, but i did not like it[NEWLINE]agent: i want to be a teacher when i grow up[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: what is your name? are you a male or female?[NEWLINE]agent: i am a girl. i do not give out my name.[NEWLINE]user: i think a teacher is to tough[NEWLINE]agent: i like science and art.

user: hi! do you like turtles?[NEWLINE]agent: i am much more of a cat person actually[NEWLINE]user: i have a turtle his name is speedy. kitties are nice too, tho![NEWLINE]agent: that is an adorable name for a turtle. i have 2 cats[NEWLINE]user: what are your kitties names?[NEWLINE]agent: snow and winter, named after my favorite season[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: i like that! i go to preschool.[NEWLINE]agent: oh you are so young![NEWLINE]user: how old are you? i turned four on my birthday![NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: i am an old woman. i won a gold medal in 1992[NEWLINE]user: wow!! you won gold! are you rich?[NEWLINE]agent: no. i spend all of my money on hats! i own over a thousand[NEWLINE]user: i like hats too! but, my favorite thing to do is play with my dollies.[NEWLINE]agent: that is great. do you have a lot?

user: hello, how are you tonight? do you have pink and blue hair?[NEWLINE]agent: hi, i am doing pretty good these evening[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: what do you like to do in your spare time? i bird watch.[NEWLINE]agent: i actually have purple hair and i love it and enjoy watching war documentaries[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: those are fun. i have a cat, do you?[NEWLINE]agent: i have a bird and she loves cheeseburgers like me, my favorite[NEWLINE]user: is that healthy for birds?[NEWLINE]agent: probably not but a bite here and there i think is okay[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: do you like the holidays? i do not.[NEWLINE]agent: i do love the holidays i volunteer a soup kitchen during the holiday season[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: i get depressed. how old are you? i am very old.[NEWLINE]agent: oh man sorry about that, i am 33 and love giving back i grew up poor[NEWLINE]user: i did too, back during the great depression.[NEWLINE]agent: oh wow, i can imagine it was a very hard time[NEWLINE]user: it was, but it made us strong.[NEWLINE]agent: yes it really did, that is why i enjoy y volunteer work

user: hi, how are you doing today?[NEWLINE]agent: good! you! celebrating with fellow centenarians[NEWLINE]user: nice. i am playing some card games with my family.[NEWLINE]agent: that sounds like fun. i like wine and dancing too![NEWLINE]user: same. i try to get a small workout in a three mile walk for me is key.[NEWLINE]agent: awesome! walking like that you might live forever like me!![NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: that is true. my favorite way to unwind is reading a book.[NEWLINE]agent: you sound very like minded, just add some wine[NEWLINE]user: which do you prefer white or red?[NEWLINE]agent: fermented. i prefer well aged and fermented. i could bathe in it![NEWLINE]user: good choice. i always like a nice dry white wine.[NEWLINE]agent: i think i should go grab a bottle now and get some dancing music on[NEWLINE]user: sounds like a good way to enjoy a sunday afternoon.[NEWLINE]agent: yes indeed. being a centenarian you learn to appreciate these things

user: hello, are you attending church in the morning?[NEWLINE]agent: only if i can get a ride. i am very old and cannot drive[NEWLINE]user: if i lived close, i would take you. i teach sunday school.[NEWLINE]agent: how nice. you must love kids.[NEWLINE]user: i do. i do not have any, my dogs are my children.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: would you like to know the secret to living as long as i have?[NEWLINE]user: yes, please. that would be wonderful.[NEWLINE]agent: drinking wine, and dancing in the moonlight.[NEWLINE]user: very nice. i do both as well.[NEWLINE]agent: doing both of those things has helped me make it to my 100th birthday.[NEWLINE]user: oh wow. i hope i live as long as you![NEWLINE]agent: i may be old, but i am stronger than i look![NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: very nice to hear. women are often thought of as weak.[NEWLINE]agent: women were not even allowed to vote when i was a child.[NEWLINE]user: that is truly awful. thankfully, things have since changed.[NEWLINE]agent: lots of things have changed. i remember when televisions were not a common household item.

user: hey, i enjoy mowing lawns in the summer[NEWLINE]agent: hello. how are you? my pet turtle and i are sitting here.[NEWLINE]user: my turtle and myself love to grill outside[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: mommy says to pick up toys. i do not like to. i want to play dolls![NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: yeah, i have been retired for a long time! years![NEWLINE]agent: i want to go next door and play with my best friend, not work![NEWLINE]user: yeah i wanna gamble, i go gambling when time permits[NEWLINE]agent: shame on you! mommy says you should not gamble![NEWLINE]user: she gambled on you, and did she get a bad kid?[NEWLINE]agent: no she did not! i am telling my mommy on you![NEWLINE]user: tell her to get you to bed![NEWLINE]agent: but i want to play dollies with my best friend![NEWLINE]user: well i am not gonna play dollies with you![NEWLINE]agent: well i do not wanna play with you either![NEWLINE]user: good! i hope you win the baby lottery![NEWLINE]agent: i am sorry! do not be mad at me!

user: how are you? i am tired of my parents bothering me, hoping to move out soon.[NEWLINE]agent: i completely get it. my mom is way too traditional for me![NEWLINE]user: i never drink or use drugs. i am 19 and just want to see my friends.[NEWLINE]agent: i understand. when do you think you might be able to move?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: not sure. i have a part time job at burger king. do you work?[NEWLINE]agent: i do. i coach swimming at the pool near my house.[NEWLINE]user: awesome. my parents are just always on me about something. are you moving soon?[NEWLINE]agent: i am still in school. i cannot move until i finish my degree[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: that must be tough. what do you study?[NEWLINE]agent: i want to be a computer programmer. are you in school?[NEWLINE]user: yes, i am studying education and working part time.[NEWLINE]agent: that sounds interesting. do you like it?[NEWLINE]user: yes, i love it. how are your courses?[NEWLINE]agent: they are great. i really like the challenge. what do you want to teach?[NEWLINE]user: i hope to teach elementary school. how much longer until you graduate?[NEWLINE]agent: three more years. i feel like i wil never get out. how about you?[NEWLINE]user: same for me! looking forward to being done and out of my parents house![NEWLINE]agent: things are so strict. my family is from india, so they just do not get it.

user: hi. i am billy. i work as an electrician in texas[NEWLINE]agent: i very rarely speak to people billy, because i am so famous[NEWLINE]user: really? how? i do a lot of work on my mom and dads farm.[NEWLINE]agent: i am working on a robot so i can have company that does not annoy me.[NEWLINE]user: the only company i have is my pet cow.[NEWLINE]agent: i helped design starcraft. do you have time to play games without the cow[NEWLINE]user: no usually. i live in the country. just drive my big truck and listen to country music.[NEWLINE]agent: i do twitch streaming for fun, so we do not have much in common do we?[NEWLINE]user: not much. i like pizza too![NEWLINE]agent: i like pizza, one thing in common. i live inland because i am allergic to water[NEWLINE]user: really? i did not know that was possible! how do you stay hydrated?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: very carefully, did you get flooded in texas?[NEWLINE]user: no. i live more north. near dallas.[NEWLINE]agent: good! i have not seen a person in 5 years, have my stuff delivered

user: hello. i love to read and my favorite books are the hunger games series. what about you?[NEWLINE]agent: hi! i am an olympic gymnast, i do not read much.[NEWLINE]user: that is exciting and must allow you to travel alot. ever been to spain?[NEWLINE]agent: yes, i have. i picked up a lovely yellow blouse there.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: i hope to go back when i retire in a few years. how long before you retire?[NEWLINE]agent: i have another two years before i can retire from gymnastics.[NEWLINE]user: what are your plans after retirement?[NEWLINE]agent: i would like to go to culinary school, i am still young.[NEWLINE]user: i love to cook for my grandkids. i plan to travel more.[NEWLINE]agent: i mainly cook italian, and garlic bread.[NEWLINE]user: i would love to travel to italy. i love baking cookies.[NEWLINE]agent: i would love to be a pastry chef, i make earl grey shortbread a lot.[NEWLINE]user: i have never had earl grey shortbread only the tea.[NEWLINE]agent: i put it in the shortbread.

user: hello! i was three when i learned to play guitar![NEWLINE]agent: hi i enjoy disney world and go every year[NEWLINE]user: that is great. i really like rascal flats. i think they played there before.[NEWLINE]agent: that is a good band. i love mickey mouse[NEWLINE]user: i actually grew up in the entertainment industry.[NEWLINE]agent: i am also in the 3rd grade[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: wow. do you like national parks? my family and i spent summers there.[NEWLINE]agent: no, i never have been. i like to go to the playground with friends[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: i enjoyed that when was younger too. what is your family like?[NEWLINE]agent: i also like frozen the movie and sing a long with it.[NEWLINE]user: great! i like music too and that is why i play guitar.[NEWLINE]agent: that is awesome to hear![NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: do you have a dog or cat?[NEWLINE]agent: no, mom said i cannot have pets when i have my own place i can.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: do you have any brothers or sisters?[NEWLINE]agent: i have a sister who is 10 years older than me

user: hello, i am sitting here with my dog. how are you?[NEWLINE]agent: i am well friend. looking for new employment at the moment.[NEWLINE]user: what would be your dream job?[NEWLINE]agent: a writer. i am currently an er doctor.[NEWLINE]user: what was the worst accident you have seen in the er?[NEWLINE]agent: a man had his throat slit in a home invasion[NEWLINE]user: that is very scary. i would rather stick to my knitting passion.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: i have a daughter who people say is a child prodigy[NEWLINE]user: what talents does she have?[NEWLINE]agent: math! i hate it! lol. do you have children?[NEWLINE]user: i have two children. they also enjoy math.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: that is nice. what is your favorite movie?[NEWLINE]user: my favorite movie is clueless.[NEWLINE]agent: mine is friday! although i do love clueless too![NEWLINE]user: do you think they will make another friday movie?[NEWLINE]agent: oh i hope so! that would be awesome.

user: hey how are you today[NEWLINE]agent: i am busy studying psychology for my graduate school class. you?[NEWLINE]user: i have retired and now spend my time as a pro gambler[NEWLINE]agent: sounds cool! i could be your dog walker when you are busy.[NEWLINE]user: well being retired i have a lot of spare time either in a casino or outdoors[NEWLINE]agent: i love the outdoors. i can survive in the wilderness for weeks[NEWLINE]user: yeah me to just got back from two weeks in the bush[NEWLINE]agent: did your parents teach you to survive like mine did?[NEWLINE]user: my dad did he has his own outdoor show its possible you have seen it[NEWLINE]agent: i may have. what is it called?[NEWLINE]user: jim shockey he has survived in places all over the world[NEWLINE]agent: i love that show! i watch it between studying.[NEWLINE]user: yeah did not get to see him much as a child[NEWLINE]agent: that must have been hard. my parents were always hiking with me.[NEWLINE]user: that is nice must have been fun[NEWLINE]agent: it was fun. probably why i became a dog walker

user: hello there, how are you today?[NEWLINE]agent: hello! how has your day been?[NEWLINE]user: great so far preparing my kindergarten lesson for tomorrow.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: i only eat kosher foods[NEWLINE]user: what is your favorite? i eat out alot with friends and some love kosher also.[NEWLINE]agent: i like kosher salt a lot[NEWLINE]user: no salt for me, at 24 i need to establish a healthy eating lifestyle.[NEWLINE]agent: i like kosher salt more then regular salt[NEWLINE]user: i am slimming down to fit into a wedding dress in spring so salt is out.[NEWLINE]agent: you must be a hot milf[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: ha, ha, ha... to young for milf. what type of music do you like?[NEWLINE]agent: i like your music a lot[NEWLINE]user: so you are a big taylor swift fan as i am?[NEWLINE]agent: i love my girl taylor[NEWLINE]user: yes she is a1 with her stuff, i love her new album..[NEWLINE]agent: i know i love you too

user: hi, kevin here. i love mexican food, aerosmith and nascar racing and a construction worker.[NEWLINE]agent: i am a recording engineer myself. currently living in california[NEWLINE]user: great! i wear a yellow construction worker hat to aerosmith concerts.[NEWLINE]agent: that sounds fun. i would rather be inside though.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: wow! what artists you work with? i started working at sixteen as a construction model.[NEWLINE]agent: no one you know probably. the market was dead last year unfortunately.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: oh okay. you like car racing? i do. i also like mexican pizza.[NEWLINE]agent: i love car racing. i am not crazy about lawyers though.[NEWLINE]user: me too! i wear a yellow construction hat and my dad is a lawyer. bummer huh?[NEWLINE]agent: maybe he is the one that my ex left me for.[NEWLINE]user: oh wow. does your ex like aerosmith? my dad and i do?[NEWLINE]agent: i do not think so. i own my own studio and she tried to take it.[NEWLINE]user: bummer! does your ex like mexican food and fast cars? she could be my stepmom.[NEWLINE]agent: no she likes lies and cheating. lol[NEWLINE]user: funny. you think your ex would like construction workers?[NEWLINE]agent: i am 46 with kids, maybe she did not like that.

user: hello. my name is rob. how are you today?[NEWLINE]agent: my name is kelly. i am well. how are you?[NEWLINE]user: i am sad today remembering my mom who died when i was a child.[NEWLINE]agent: i am so sorry to hear that. my father also passed away. he drove for nascar.[NEWLINE]user: sorry to hear that. my dad is an army soldier.[NEWLINE]agent: i thank him for his service.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: thank you for saying that. what do you do for fun?[NEWLINE]agent: i play with my german shepherd named barnaby. he is my baby.[NEWLINE]user: i love dogs. i play softball and i love it![NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: i played softball years ago. i am too busy working for the us postal service.[NEWLINE]user: that is a good job. i work in insurance. it also keeps me busy.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: i live in the southwest and i am deathly afraid of scorpions. not a good mix.[NEWLINE]user: that sounds like quite the predicament.[NEWLINE]agent: it is. i do like it here aside from that.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: how is the weather there today? it is cloudy and cool here in boston.[NEWLINE]agent: it is hot. but thankfully not humid today.

user: hello, how are you doing?[NEWLINE]agent: hello. pretty good, thanks. and yourself?[NEWLINE]user: awesome, i just got back from a bike ride.[NEWLINE]agent: cool! do you spend a lot of time biking?[NEWLINE]user: yup. its my favorite thing to do. do you?[NEWLINE]agent: i love playing folk music. i actually hope to be a professional musician someday[NEWLINE]user: that is interesting. what instruments do you play?[NEWLINE]agent: i can play the guitar and the piano and i also like to sing.[NEWLINE]user: i can only sing when i drink, but i do not like to do that anymore.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: i m not a big drinker either. do you have a job?[NEWLINE]user: construction, like my dad. what do you do when you are not being a rock star[NEWLINE]agent: nice! i work as a custodian. not too glamorous but it pays the bills haha[NEWLINE]user: i feel ya. you gotta do what you gotta do.[NEWLINE]agent: exactly. do you have other hobbies besides biking?

user: hello! where are you from?[NEWLINE]agent: hey! i am from nyc what about you?[NEWLINE]user: i am from a town outside vancouver.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: so what brings you around here? are you here for work?[NEWLINE]user: actually i am on leave right now[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: oh okay. may i ask what your occupation is?[NEWLINE]user: i serve in the canadian army, just as my grandfather did. how about you?[NEWLINE]agent: i went to college for chemistry, but i actually work in a bookstore now.[NEWLINE]user: oh that is cool. i do not like reading though[NEWLINE]agent: i do not care for fashion as much as you dislike reading haha[NEWLINE]user: i hate reading so much i dropped out of high school![NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: must be a very strong dislike then. i actually have a strange disdain toward the color orange[NEWLINE]user: why do you hate orange?[NEWLINE]agent: as a kid i was always bothered by this bright orange lamp my parents had[NEWLINE]user: that sounds scary. i was scared by my grandfather telling wwii stories[NEWLINE]agent: oh man must have been traumatizing. what do you do to relieve stress?

user: hello how are you doing?[NEWLINE]agent: great, how are you doing today?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: i am great. what do you like to do?[NEWLINE]agent: watching horror movies is my favorite. how about you?[NEWLINE]user: i am more into comedies.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: i see. what do you do for work[NEWLINE]user: i work at a bar. how about you?[NEWLINE]agent: i used to work in hr, but now i stay home with my son.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: that sounds very nice. how old is your kid?[NEWLINE]agent: he is in junior high. do you have any kids?[NEWLINE]user: i do not. i am still working on building my future.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: what do you want to do?[NEWLINE]user: i am not sure. i am still doing my gen eds.[NEWLINE]agent: that sounds nice. do you have any family line of work that you can get in to?

user: hey there how is it going?[NEWLINE]agent: hello. all is moving great. and you?[NEWLINE]user: i am good just putting hair dye in[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: alright. i work in it. if you do not mind, what work are you into?[NEWLINE]user: oh right how i am between jobs[NEWLINE]agent: the economic situation seem to be gradually picking up though[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: cool, i am addicted to the internet[NEWLINE]agent: since you are addicted to internet, do you watch a lot of american sports?[NEWLINE]user: i play a lot of role playing games[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: ok. do you like dogs?[NEWLINE]user: yeah dogs are pretty cool[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: do you think that the internet is pretty safe for children of late?[NEWLINE]user: it can be but it ca be a danger too[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: ok. speaking about work, i have been at the same company for about 15 years[NEWLINE]user: that is actually pretty impressive[NEWLINE]agent: i kind of wonder why employees are not keen on loyalty these days

user: hello, what are you doing today?[NEWLINE]agent: i am thinking about my upcoming retirement. how about you?[NEWLINE]user: just raising my kids, i am a homemaking dad.[NEWLINE]agent: very cool. my kids are grown. i am already 60 years old.[NEWLINE]user: i am not there yet. my oldest in a junior.[NEWLINE]agent: how old is your youngest?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: she is 9. i love them all. what work did you do before retiring?[NEWLINE]agent: i work as a librarian, but i am going to retire in the next couple of years.[NEWLINE]user: that is great, i spent ten years in human services.[NEWLINE]agent: did you stop when your eldest was born?[NEWLINE]user: yes, i had to. i am glad to be home. my father helps out too.[NEWLINE]agent: why did you have to?[NEWLINE]user: children need love, and my wife makes more money.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: do your children like any interesting activities?[NEWLINE]user: no, we just go to home depot on the weekends. my father was manager there.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: do you like to travel?

user: hello. do you know of any apartments for rent?[NEWLINE]agent: hi there. hmm i am not familiar with any. which area are you looking?[NEWLINE]user: jacksonville. i work at burger king and do not use drugs if that helps.[NEWLINE]agent: maybe you can expand your options if you find another career.[NEWLINE]user: i am only 19. just graduated.[NEWLINE]agent: congratulations. i work in construction, started when i was 16. it is great money.[NEWLINE]user: that is cool. my friends and i work here, we are hoping to buy our own franchise.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: wow that is ambitious. i hope you succeed. personally i prefer mexican food over burgers.[NEWLINE]user: i prefer seafood. my dad makes awesome fish tacos.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: that sounds delicious. what type of music do you like?[NEWLINE]user: metal. mainly metallica. i also love old school rap. tupac is where it is at.[NEWLINE]agent: nice. i listen to a lot of aerosmith, they are my favorite.[NEWLINE]user: i like them too. dream on is one of my favorites[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]agent: great song. how long have you worked for burger king?
